body_content.explanation: providing protection against mines (= bombs that explode when vehicles, ships, or people go over them):
examples: Several anti-mine vessels were on an exercise in the area.

body_content.explanation: working to remove, or to reduce the use of, mines (= bombs that explode when vehicles, ships, or people go over them):
examples: Although anti-mine organizations worked diligently, only two provinces were free of mines.
The anti-mine campaign helped raise the money needed to rid the country of the weapons.

body_content.explanation: opposed to the building of a mine (= a hole in the ground where a substance such as coal, metal, or salt is removed) or to mining (= the industry or activity of removing substances from the ground ):
examples: Anti-mine groups were forming all around the country.
The antimine coalition fought the company in the country's highest court.
